item.description:
Bridging the Gap - A mother to mother conversation about children with special needs

Mothers of typical and special needs children will meet and have a group discussion about talking to you children about special needs, supporting friends and families of children with special needs, and other topics relevant to the participants.

As this is a "moms only" event, potential members are welcome to attend! (non-mobile infants are welcome to attend.)

Many other events will be held in April-August (available to paid members only due to insurance liability policy requirements.)To become a member of the Framingham Area chapter of Mothers & More, you must either mail in an official membership form with your dues, or fill out the enrollment form online and pay via credit card at http://www.mothersand...

Please contact Asst. Organizer, Kate to have memberships forms and more chapter information mailed to you. Thanks!

Mom and Kids Lunch at Bugaboo Creek
See the Big Trucks at the Framingham DPW truck lot
Southwick Zoo Trip
Tour of Whole Foods
Berry Picking
Ice Cream at Gerards
Family Baseball Night -watch the Lowell Spinners
Davis Farmland and Splashpad Visit
Ice Skating
Family Cookout
Hopkinton State Park Beach day
Water Fun Sprinkler/Slide/Wading Pool party
Playground Drop-ins at designated Parks

*Other events that Mothers & More offers- Movie Mamas monthly movie night at the AMC Framingham, Book Group, Cooking Group, Unfinished Object Night (scrapbooking, knitting, general projects on your to-do list.)
item.name: Bridging the Gap
